info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 7:22PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A BAND OF MODERATE TO HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF HAMILTON...SOUTHERN WASHINGTON...SOUTHEAST WARREN...NORTHERN WARREN...AND NORTHERN SARATOGA COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of moderate to heavy snow accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 721 PM EST, a band of moderate to heavy snow was over Moffitt Beach Campground, or near Speculator moving southeast at 40 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Saratoga Springs, Glens Falls, Hudson Falls, Salem, Speculator, Fort Edward, Corinth, Cambridge, Greenwich, Edinburg, Lake Pleasant, Wells, Day Center, Moffitt Beach Campground, Glens Falls North, West Glens Falls, Lake Luzerne Campground, Sacandaga Campground, Kings and Mount Pleasant. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 14 and 20. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
